name: Formula Enzo
description:
# ABOUT

Formula Enzo is a Prototype game made in about 2 weeks in construct 2

The game was made to try and figure out how Mario Kart was possible in SNES and to learn how 3D graphics were made back in the day.

This game sadly won't receive any updates from now on, but it served it's purpose of learning and now it's being released for free
